roleset.name: equip with weapon/armor
roleset.note: ARMOR-V NOTES: Based on dictionary.com. Frame by Perryn. Member of Vncls equip-13.4.2-1-1. (from armor.01-v)
ARMORED-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2& 3. Framed by Claire. Member of Vncls equip-13.4.2-1-1. (from armored.01-j)

example.name: soldier
example.text: Those close to Miller believe he was shot by an armored Israeli personnel carrier.

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary-1 was armored *trace*-1 by her servants in gold chainmail in perparation for her match agains the Black Knight.
example.arg: in perparation for her match agains the Black Knight

example.name: with comparative construction
example.text: The Marine 's AAV is as armored as the standard Army APC - the M113
example.arg: as the standard Army APC - the M113

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: The ships were armored with a mix of Creusot and compound steel.
example.arg: with a mix of Creusot and compound steel.

example.name: All args -- invented
example.text: The Kaiser Friedrich III-class ships were armored by the workers with steel.
